title: The Bachelorette star Jesse Owens' bodybuilding past is revealed
text:
Jesse Owens is currently competing to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.

And now, photos of 31-year-old as a fitness model during his bodybuilding days have surfaced.

In one photo, the real estate executive can be seen posing in a pair of red shorts at a competition.

Like you've never seen him before! Bachelorette star Jesse Owens' (pictured) bodybuilding past has been revealed

In a second, Jesse is pictured with two other bodybuilders at the gym while another selfie shows him flaunting his muscular physique.

Jesse can also been seen tensing his muscles while his dragon chest tattoo is on full display.

The 31-year-old is definitely no stranger to flaunting his bodybuilder physique as he regularly posts snaps to Instagram.

Strike a pose: Photos of Jesse (pictured) as a fitness model during his bodybuilding days have surfaced

The 31-year-old, who is from Western Australia, made his debut on The Bachelorette on Wednesday night.

Shortly after arriving to the mansion, Jesse complimented Angie on her frock before making his way inside to meet the other contestants.

'Your look great, wow look at you!,' a stunned Jesse said.

Workout time! In one picture, Jesse (far right) can be seen posing with two other bodybuilders at the gym

Bodybuilding: Another selfie shows Jesse (pictured) flaunting his muscular physique and tattooed chest

The contestant was definitely determined to stand out from the pack during the red carpet introductions.

He dressed to impress in a suede green suit jacket alongside black pants and a pair of black shoes.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7.30pm on Channel Ten.
description: Jesse Owens is currently competing to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
